title: Sunset Beach Bonfire
description: Join us for an unforgettable sunset bonfire on the beach. Bring your favorite snacks and stories!

title: Goa Food Tour
description: Explore the best street food spots in Goa. Taste authentic Goan cuisine with a local guide.

title: Water Sports Adventure
description: Jet skiing parasailing and paddleboarding. All equipment provided. Beginner-friendly!

title: Yoga & Meditation
description: Start your day with sunrise yoga and meditation. Perfect for relaxation and connection.

title: Night Market Exploration
description: Discover local crafts street art and hidden gems at the night market.

title: Hiking Trail Adventure
description: Scenic hiking trail with breathtaking views. Moderate difficulty. Bring water and snacks.

title: Windsurfing at Baga Beach
description: Experience the thrill of windsurfing at one of Goa's most popular beaches. Equipment and instruction included.

title: Cafe La Plage Sunset
description: Enjoy a beautiful sunset while dining at Cafe La Plage with stunning beach views.

title: Spice Plantation Tour
description: Explore authentic Goan spice plantations learn about local spices and enjoy traditional Goan lunch.

title: Beach Bonfire
description: Gather around a cozy bonfire on the beach with music stories and great company.

title: Water Sports Package
description: Complete water sports package including jet skiing parasailing banana boat and more.

title: Photography Tour
description: Capture the beauty of Goa with a guided photography tour to the most photogenic spots.
